name: MSConversation
desc: An object that represents a conversation in the Messages app.

items.name: var selectedMessage: MSMessage?
items.desc: The message that the user selected in the conversation transcript.

items.name: var localParticipantIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A UUID that identifies the user on this device.

items.name: var remoteParticipantIdentifiers: [UUID]
items.desc: An array of UUIDs representing the remote participants in this conversation.

items.name: func insertAttachment(URL, withAlternateFilename: String?, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Inserts an attachment into the current context.

items.name: func insert(MSMessage, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Inserts a message object into the Messages app’s input field.

items.name: func insert(MSSticker, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Inserts a sticker into the current context.

items.name: func insertText(String, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Inserts text into the Messages app’s input field.

items.name: func sendAttachment(URL, withAlternateFilename: String?, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Sends the media file specified by the given URL.
